about_the_game:
NOTE: ALL YOUR PROGRESS SHOULD BE TRANSFERRED TO THE FULL GAME IF YOU DECIDE TO BUY IT.

Your cats have been kidnapped by your brother and now they're in danger!

Massi vs. José is a reimagination of the first adventure of Massi, released back in 2016. Be ready to test your skills by beating 10 levels in this demo, filled with coins and collectibles. There are a variety of different platforms that will shape your journey through 2 worlds of this demo.

Key Features

  • Beautiful pixel art, expressive animations and stunning visual effects.

  • 2 worlds with different themes, each one with 5 levels. That's a total of 10 levels to explore and get 3 stars in each one of them!

  • Grab the key in each level to go to the next!

  • Controller support.

Full Game Features

  • Achievements & Leaderboards.

  • 8 worlds, each one with 5 levels! (40 levels).

name: Massi vs. José Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 2D pixel-art platformer with challenging levels and collectibles. Play as Massi and rescue your cats from your brother!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
